name: Aevum: Napora's Fall
description:
Aevum: Napora's Fall is a 30-60 minutes long 2D Hack-and-Slash Sidescroller with a simple combo system. Chain together attacks and wipe out enemies before they get the chance to retalliate.

Credits:

n91 - Level Ambiance
adonicipher - Boss Battle Music
nene (opengameart) -  Boss Battle Music
CleytonKauffman - Boss Battle Music
Freesounds.org - Sound Effects

MagmaCow (GameBanana) - Sound Effects
Kenney - Sound Effects
